item.description:
This was posted as an idea and since I'm going (with a couple of friends), it must be a good idea!
It should be a great show in an intimate setting.

We can meet up at the venue. If you we miss each other before the show, we'll catch up at intermission.

From Wikipedia: Fred Eaglesmith is a Canadian alternative country singer-songwriter. Eaglesmith's songs are populated with down and out characters dealing with loss of love or livelihood, and quirky rural folk. His songwriting uses many of the techniques of short-story writing, including unreliable narrators, surprise endings, and plot twists.

Here's the description from Me & Thee:
www.meandthee.org/Eaglesmith-Powers.html

http://www.meandthee....
http://fredeaglesmith...

Please note in your reply if you have tix or plan to buy at the door.
item.how_to_find_us: I will email cell# to attendees. Otherwise ask for meetup at the door.
item.name: Fred Eaglesmith @ Me and Thee Coffeehouse
